channel.title: [317] Project Bloodshed
channel.description:
Base: Delta* *I have totally cleaned the DeltaScape source and added proper conventions. The source is FAR more stable now. Also, I have configured the source to work with any client including Galkon's Refractored, 317 Deob and even Silab client.
Now you must fill out this short form to apply. [code]Age: Time Zone: Experience: MSN (yes, you must have MSN): Extra Info (optional):[/code]
I am looking for someone who is good with clients especially, as I am not good with them. Server wise, I don't mind if you are not the most experienced. You don't have to be an expert on Java because I am not either. Client sided I want new GS stances, walking anims, running anims and proper specials. And maybe the new attack interfaces. Everyone who helps develops the server will get a co owner/admin position when the server releases. I plan to buy a VPS for it when it is ready.
Here are a few pictures of my progress. Note: This isn't all I have done.
Video of DDS spec: [url=http://img532.imageshack.us/img532/2235/ddsspec.mp4]http://img532.imageshack.us/img532/2235/ddsspec.mp4[/url] As you can see the spec hits much faster now.
Picture: [url=http://img171.imageshack.us/i/94460192.jpg/]http://img171.imageshack.us/i/94460192.jpg/[/url]
EDIT: Protection against AFG Bot and SYI have been added!

item.description:
@dwarvenknight wrote:

Base: Delta*
*I have totally cleaned the DeltaScape source and added proper conventions. The source is FAR more stable now. Also, I have configured the source to work with any client including Galkon’s Refractored, 317 Deob and even Silab client.

Now you must fill out this short form to apply.

Age: Time Zone: Experience: MSN (yes, you must have MSN): Extra Info (optional):

I am looking for someone who is good with clients especially, as I am not good with them. Server wise, I don’t mind if you are not the most experienced. You don’t have to be an expert on Java because I am not either. Client sided I want new GS stances, walking anims, running anims and proper specials. And maybe the new attack interfaces. Everyone who helps develops the server will get a co owner/admin position when the server releases. I plan to buy a VPS for it when it is ready.

Here are a few pictures of my progress. Note: This isn’t all I have done.

As you can see the spec hits much faster now.
